Reviews.Title: Buyer be aware!
Reviews.Author: siaK
Reviews.Content: For the price of the camera and the lenz I was expecting some serious pictures. I got the panasonic 14-140 HD OIS lenz with the camera. Pictures are mediocre with this lenz. Camera and lenz not much lighter than my old DSLR and picture quality is somewhere between a dlsr and a cybershot cam. I got this to replace the DLSR that i lost! during an oversee trip. Bought this from Pancam thru amazon and although it said brand new the first one was leaving green haze on the picts. I contacted Pancam and they replaced the camera and the lenz pretty quickly. Service was great but never felt that the items were actually brand new!

Reviews.Title: Best DSLR in all terms  I Love it
Reviews.Author: Umardilse
Reviews.Content: Simply the best. I love all the Panasonic MFT line series Included Prime Lenses and Body GH2 and GH3.Amazing.
